Actions.Text: HELD FOR CONSIDERATION IN GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS

Title: Requires the disclosure of information pertaining to book deals or contracts
Summary: Requires members of the legislature, legislative employees, statewide elected officials, or state officers or employees to apply to the joint commission on public ethics for approval before entering into any book deal or contract; requires the disclosure of information pertaining to such book deals or contracts in the required financial disclosure form and on the joint commission of public ethics and legislative ethics commission websites.
LawCode: Amd §§73 & 73-a, Pub Off L; amd §94, Exec L; amd §80, Leg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, the executive law and the legislative law, in relation to requiring the disclosure of information pertaining to book deals or contracts
